trans-unit.source: When a page uses session, PHP will automatically send some cache-related HTTP headers as specified in the session.cache_limiter PHP INI setting. These headers may interfere or disable the caching that you want from HttpCache. To prevent this problem, by default HttpCache will disable sending these headers automatically. If you want to change this behavior, you should configure the yii\filters\HttpCache::$sessionCacheLimiter property. The property can take a string value, including public, private, private_no_expire, and nocache. Please refer to the PHP manual about session_cache_limiter() for explanations about these values.
trans-unit.target: 当页面使用会话时，PHP将按照 session.cache_limiter PHP INI设置中指定的方式自动发送一些与缓存相关的HTTP标头。这些标头可能会干扰或禁用所需的 HttpCache 缓存。为避免此问题，默认情况下 HttpCache 将禁用自动发送这些标头。如果要更改此行为，应配置yii \ filters \ HttpCache :: $ sessionCacheLimiter属性。该属性可以采用字符串值，包括 public ， private ， private_no_expire 和 nocache 。请参考PHP手册中的session_cache_limiter（） 有关这些值的说明。

trans-unit.source: When a request is parsed into an empty route, the so-called default route will be used, instead. By default, the default route is site/index, which refers to the index action of the site controller. You may customize it by configuring the defaultRoute property of the application in the application configuration like the following:

trans-unit.source: When a rule is used to parse a URL, it will fill the associated parameters with values matching the corresponding parts of the URL, and these parameters will be made available in $_GET later by the request application component. When the rule is used to create a URL, it will take the values of the provided parameters and insert them at the places where the parameters are declared.
trans-unit.target: 当使用规则解析URL时，它将用与URL的相应​​部分匹配的值填充关联的参数，稍后这些参数将在 $_GET 由 request 应用程序组件提供。当使用规则创建URL时，它将采用所提供参数的值并将其插入声明参数的位置。

trans-unit.source: When a translation is not found for an original message specified in Yii::t() call, the plural rules for the source language will be applied to the original message.
trans-unit.target: 如果未为 Yii::t() 调用中指定的原始消息找到翻译，则源语言的复数规则将应用于原始消息。

trans-unit.source: When a user runs composer install to install an extension, the file vendor/yiisoft/extensions.php will be automatically updated to include the information about the new extension. From this file, Yii applications can know which extensions are installed (the information can be accessed via yii\base\Application::$extensions).
trans-unit.target: 当用户运行 composer install 安装扩展程序时，文件 vendor/yiisoft/extensions.php 将自动更新以包括有关新扩展程序的信息。从这个文件中，Yii应用程序可以知道安装了哪些扩展（可以通过yii \ base \ Application :: $ extensions访问该信息）。

trans-unit.source: When a widget contains view code only, it is very similar to a view. In fact, in this case, their only difference is that a widget is a redistributable class, while a view is just a plain PHP script that you would prefer to keep within your application.
trans-unit.target: 当窗口小部件仅包含视图代码时，它与view非常相似。实际上，在这种情况下，它们的唯一区别是小部件是可重新分发的类，而视图只是您希望保留在应用程序中的纯PHP脚本。

trans-unit.source: When an application finishes handling a request, it generates a response object and sends it to the end user. The response object contains information such as the HTTP status code, HTTP headers and body. The ultimate goal of Web application development is essentially to build such response objects upon various requests.
trans-unit.target: 当应用程序完成对请求的处理后，它会生成一个响应对象并将其发送给最终用户。响应对象包含诸如HTTP状态代码，HTTP标头和正文的信息。 Web应用程序开发的最终目标实质上是根据各种请求构建此类响应对象。

trans-unit.source: When an asset bundle is registered with a view, behind the scenes Yii will register all its dependent asset bundles. And if an asset bundle is located in a directory inaccessible through the Web, it will be published to a Web directory. Later, when the view renders a page, it will generate <link> and <script> tags for the CSS and JavaScript files listed in the registered bundles. The order of these tags is determined by the dependencies among the registered bundles and the order of the assets listed in the yii\web\AssetBundle::$css and yii\web\AssetBundle::$js properties.
trans-unit.target: 在视图中注册资产捆绑包时，Yii将在后台注册其所有从属资产捆绑包。并且，如果资产捆绑包位于无法通过Web访问的目录中，则它将被发布到Web目录中。稍后，当视图呈现页面时，它将为注册捆绑中列出的CSS和JavaScript文件生成 <link> 和 <script> 标记。这些标签的顺序取决于注册的包之间的依赖性以及yii \ web \ AssetBundle :: $ css和yii \ web \ AssetBundle :: $ js属性中列出的资产的顺序。

trans-unit.source: When creating widgets, you should still follow the MVC pattern. In general, you should keep logic in widget classes and keep presentation in views.

trans-unit.source: When data needs to be rendered in multiple pages, Pagination can be used to represent information such as total item count, page size, current page, etc. These information can be passed to pagers to render pagination buttons or links.
trans-unit.target: 当需要在多个页面中呈现数据时，可以使用分页来表示诸如项目总数，页面大小，当前页面等之类的信息。这些信息可以传递给寻呼机以呈现分页按钮或链接。

trans-unit.source: When data needs to be sorted according to one or several attributes, we can use Sort to represent the sorting information and generate appropriate hyperlinks that can lead to sort actions.
trans-unit.target: 当需要根据一个或几个属性对数据进行排序时,我们可以使用Sort来表示排序信息,并生成相应的超链接,从而实现排序操作。

trans-unit.source: When dealing with some complex data, it is possible that you may need to use multiple different models to collect the user input. For example, assuming the user login information is stored in the user table while the user profile information is stored in the profile table, you may want to collect the input data about a user through a User model and a Profile model. With the Yii model and form support, you can solve this problem in a way that is not much different from handling a single model.
trans-unit.target: 处理某些复杂数据时，可能需要使用多个不同的模型来收集用户输入。例如，假设用户登录信息存储在 user 表中，而用户配置文件信息存储在 profile 表中，则您可能希望通过 User 模型和 Profile 模型收集有关用户的输入数据。借助Yii模型和表单支持，您可以通过与处理单个模型没有太大不同的方式解决此问题。

trans-unit.source: When defining an asset bundle class, if you specify the sourcePath property, it means any assets listed using relative paths will be considered as source assets. If you do not specify this property, it means those assets are published assets (you should therefore specify basePath and baseUrl to let Yii know where they are located).
trans-unit.target: 在定义资产捆绑包类时，如果指定sourcePath属性，则意味着使用相对路径列出的任何资产都将被视为源资产。如果您未指定此属性，则意味着这些资产是已发布的资产（因此，您应指定basePath和baseUrl以便Yii知道它们的位置）。

trans-unit.source: When developing a complex Web application, it is important to optimize URL rules so that it takes less time to parse requests and create URLs.
trans-unit.target: 在开发一个复杂的Web应用时,优化URL规则很重要,这样可以减少解析请求和创建URL的时间。

trans-unit.source: When displaying active records in a GridView you might encounter the case where you display values of related columns such as the post author's name instead of just his id. You do this by defining the attribute name in yii\grid\GridView::$columns as author.name when the Post model has a relation named author and the author model has an attribute name. The GridView will then display the name of the author but sorting and filtering are not enabled by default. You have to adjust the PostSearch model that has been introduced in the last section to add this functionality.
trans-unit.target: 在GridView中显示活动记录时，您可能会遇到以下情况：显示相关列的值，例如帖子作者的姓名，而不仅仅是他的 id 。当 Post 模型具有名为 author 的关系并且author模型具有attribute name 时，可以通过在 author.name \ grid \ GridView :: $ columns中将属性名称定义为author.name来实现。然后，GridView将显示作者的姓名，但默认情况下未启用排序和筛选。您必须调整上一节介绍的 PostSearch 模型才能添加此功能。

trans-unit.source: When implementing RESTful APIs, you often need to retrieve parameters that are submitted via PUT, PATCH or other request methods. You can get these parameters by calling the yii\web\Request::getBodyParam() methods. For example,
trans-unit.target: 实施RESTful API时，您通常需要检索通过PUT，PATCH或其他请求方法提交的参数。您可以通过调用yii \ web \ Request :: getBodyParam（）方法获取这些参数。例如，

trans-unit.source: When implementing RESTful APIs, it is commonly needed that the same URL be parsed into different routes according to the HTTP methods being used. This can be easily achieved by prefixing the supported HTTP methods to the patterns of the rules. If a rule supports multiple HTTP methods, separate the method names with commas. For example, the following rules have the same pattern post/<id:\d+> with different HTTP method support. A request for PUT post/100 will be parsed into post/update, while a request for GET post/100 will be parsed into post/view.
trans-unit.target: 在实现RESTful API时，通常需要根据所使用的HTTP方法将相同的URL解析为不同的路由。通过将支持的HTTP方法添加到规则的模式前面，可以轻松实现此目的。如果规则支持多个HTTP方法，请用逗号分隔方法名称。例如，以下规则具有相同的模式 post/<id:\d+> 具有不同的HTTP方法支持。 PUT post/100 的请求将解析为 post/update ，而 GET post/100 的请求将解析为 post/view 。

trans-unit.source: When including a resource in a RESTful API response, the resource needs to be serialized into a string. Yii breaks this process into two steps. First, the resource is converted into an array by yii\rest\Serializer. Second, the array is serialized into a string in a requested format (e.g. JSON, XML) by response formatters. The first step is what you should mainly focus when developing a resource class.
trans-unit.target: 在RESTful API响应中包含资源时，需要将该资源序列化为字符串。Yii将此过程分为两个步骤。首先，yii \ rest \ Serializer将资源转换为数组。其次，响应格式化程序将数组序列化为请求格式（例如JSON，XML）的字符串。第一步是开发资源类时应主要关注的方面。

trans-unit.source: When input data are submitted from HTML forms, you often need to assign some default values to the inputs if they are empty. You can do so by using the default validator. For example,
trans-unit.target: 从HTML表单提交输入数据时，如果输入为空，则通常需要为其分配一些默认值。您可以通过使用默认验证器来实现。例如，

trans-unit.source: When overwriting an existing file, check the box next to "overwrite" and then click the "Generate" button. If creating a new file, you can just click "Generate".

trans-unit.source: When parsing or creating URLs, URL manager examines URL rules in the order they are declared. Therefore, you may consider adjusting the order of the URL rules so that more specific and/or more commonly used rules are placed before less used ones.
trans-unit.target: 解析或创建URL时，URL管理器按声明的顺序检查URL规则。因此，您可以考虑调整URL规则的顺序，以便将更具体和/或更常用的规则放在不常用的规则之前。

trans-unit.target: 启用查询缓存后（$ enableQueryCache为true，$ queryCache引用有效的缓存），将在可调用对象中执行的查询被缓存，并且如果有查询，将从缓存中获取其结果。例如，

trans-unit.source: When querying data through one of the querying methods, each newly populated Active Record will undergo the following life cycle:
trans-unit.target: 通过一种查询方法查询数据时，每个新填充的Active Record将经历以下生命周期：

trans-unit.source: When rate limiting is enabled, by default every response will be sent with the following HTTP headers containing the current rate limiting information:
trans-unit.target: 当启用速率限制时,默认情况下,每个响应都会发送包含当前速率限制信息的以下HTTP头信息。

trans-unit.source: When returning data from a database using the DAO database layer all data will be represented as strings, which is not always the expected result especially numeric values should be represented as numbers in JSON. When using the ActiveRecord layer for retrieving data from the database, the values for numeric columns will be converted to integers when data is fetched from the database in yii\db\ActiveRecord::populateRecord().
trans-unit.target: 使用DAO数据库层从数据库返回数据时，所有数据都将表示为字符串，这并不总是预期的结果，尤其是数值应以JSON中的数字表示。当使用ActiveRecord层从数据库中检索数据时，从yii \ db \ ActiveRecord :: populateRecord（）中从数据库中获取数据时，数字列的值将转换为整数。

trans-unit.source: When rows of data are being fetched, the corresponding column value will be set in the variable. Note, the fetch mode must include PDO::FETCH_BOUND.
trans-unit.target: 当数据行被获取时,相应的列值将被设置在变量中。注意,获取模式必须包含PDO::FETCH_BOUND。

trans-unit.source: When running a command, you need to specify the route to the controller action. For example, the route migrate/create invokes the sub-command that corresponds to the MigrateController::actionCreate() action method. If a route offered during execution does not contain an action ID, the default action will be executed (as with a web controller).
trans-unit.target: 运行命令时，需要指定到控制器操作的路由。例如，路由 migrate/create 调用与MigrateController :: actionCreate（）操作方法相对应的子命令。如果在执行过程中提供的路由不包含操作ID，则将执行默认操作（与Web控制器一样）。

trans-unit.source: When running multiple related queries in a sequence, you may need to wrap them in a transaction to ensure the integrity and consistency of your database. If any of the queries fails, the database will be rolled back to the state as if none of these queries were executed.
trans-unit.target: 当在一个序列中运行多个相关查询时,你可能需要将它们包裹在一个事务中,以确保数据库的完整性和一致性。如果任何一个查询失败,数据库将被回滚到状态,就像这些查询都没有被执行一样。

trans-unit.source: When specifying fixtures in fixtures(), you may use either a class name or a configuration array to refer to a fixture. The configuration array will let you customize the fixture properties when the fixture is loaded.
trans-unit.target: 在 fixtures() 中指定灯具时，可以使用类名或配置数组来引用灯具。配置数组将允许您在加载灯具时自定义灯具属性。

trans-unit.source: When the yii\base\Component::trigger() method is called, it will call all handlers attached to the named event.
trans-unit.target: 当警予\基地\组件::触发（）方法被调用时，它会调用连接到指定事件的所有处理。

trans-unit.source: When the supported formats property is specified, ContentNegotiator will support response format negotiation based on the value of the GET parameter $formatParam and the Accept HTTP header. If a match is found, the yii\web\Response::$format property will be set as the chosen format. The yii\web\Response::$acceptMimeType as well as yii\web\Response::$acceptParams will also be updated accordingly.
trans-unit.target: 当指定了支持的格式属性时，ContentNegotiator将支持基于GET参数$ formatParam的值和 Accept HTTP标头的响应格式协商。如果找到匹配项，则yii \ web \ Response :: $ format属性将设置为所选格式。该警予\网络\响应:: $ acceptMimeType以及警予\网络\响应:: $ acceptParams也会相应更新。

trans-unit.source: When the supported languages is specified, ContentNegotiator will support application language negotiation based on the value of the GET parameter $languageParam and the Accept-Language HTTP header. If a match is found, the yii\base\Application::$language property will be set as the chosen language.
trans-unit.target: 当支持的语言指定，ContentNegotiator将根据GET参数的值支持应用程序语言协商$ languageParam和 Accept-Language HTTP标头。如果找到匹配项，则yii \ base \ Application :: $ language属性将设置为所选语言。

trans-unit.source: When the logger object flushes log messages to log targets, they do not get exported immediately. Instead, the message exporting only occurs when a log target accumulates certain number of the filtered messages. You can customize this number by configuring the exportInterval property of individual log targets, like the following,

trans-unit.target: 当 validate() 方法被调用时，它执行以下步骤来执行验证：

trans-unit.source: When the application ends or $flushInterval is reached, Logger will call flush() to send logged messages to different log targets, such as file, email, or database, with the help of the $dispatcher.
trans-unit.target: 当应用程序结束或到达$ flushInterval时，Logger将在$ dispatcher的帮助下调用flush（）将记录的消息发送到不同的日志目标，例如文件，电子邮件或数据库。

trans-unit.source: When the array is empty, or the option is not set, all the IP addresses are allowed. Otherwise, the rules are checked sequentially until the first match is found. IP address is forbidden, when it has not matched any of the rules.
trans-unit.target: 当数组为空或未设置选项时,允许使用所有的IP地址。否则,将按顺序检查规则,直到找到第一个匹配的IP。当一个IP地址不符合任何规则时,它将被禁止。

trans-unit.source: When the array is empty, or the option not set, all IP addresses are allowed.
trans-unit.target: 当数组为空或未设置选项时,允许使用所有IP地址。

trans-unit.source: When the columns are specified as an array, you may also use array keys as the column aliases (if a column does not need alias, do not use a string key).
trans-unit.target: 当列被指定为数组时,也可以使用数组键作为列的别名(如果一个列不需要别名,不要使用字符串键)。

trans-unit.source: When the connection is no longer necessary and the result set has been retrieved, it can be closed:
trans-unit.target: 当不再需要连接,且结果集已经检索完毕时,可以关闭该连接。

trans-unit.source: When the current request is an AJAX request, sending a Location header will not automatically cause the browser to redirect. To solve this problem, the yii\web\Response::redirect() method sets an X-Redirect header with the redirection URL as its value. On the client-side, you may write JavaScript code to read this header value and redirect the browser accordingly.
trans-unit.target: 当当前请求是AJAX请求时，发送 Location 标头不会自动导致浏览器重定向。为了解决此问题，yii \ web \ Response :: redirect（）方法设置 X-Redirect 标头，并将重定向URL作为其值。在客户端，您可以编写JavaScript代码来读取此标头值并相应地重定向浏览器。

trans-unit.source: When the data for a model is received from end users, it should be validated to make sure it satisfies certain rules (called validation rules, also known as business rules). For example, given a ContactForm model, you may want to make sure all attributes are not empty and the email attribute contains a valid email address. If the values for some attributes do not satisfy the corresponding business rules, appropriate error messages should be displayed to help the user to fix the errors.
trans-unit.target: 当从最终用户那里收到模型的数据时，应进行验证以确保其满足某些规则（称为验证规则，也称为业务规则）。例如，给定一个 ContactForm 模型，您可能要确保所有属性都不为空，并且 email 属性包含有效的电子邮件地址。如果某些属性的值不满足相应的业务规则，则应显示适当的错误消息以帮助用户修复错误。

trans-unit.source: When the extension is installed in an application, Yii will automatically instantiate the bootstrapping class and call its bootstrap() method during the bootstrapping process for every request.
trans-unit.target: 当扩展安装在应用程序中时，Yii将自动实例化自举类并在自举过程中针对每个请求调用其bootstrap（）方法。

trans-unit.source: When the extension is installed in an application, Yii will create for each listed root namespace an alias that refers to the directory corresponding to the namespace. For example, the above autoload declaration will correspond to an alias named @yii/imagine.
trans-unit.target: 当扩展安装在应用程序中时，Yii将为每个列出的根名称空间创建一个别名，该别名引用与该名称空间相对应的目录。例如，上面的 autoload 声明将对应于一个名为 @yii/imagine 的别名。

trans-unit.source: When the fixture is being loaded, it will first call resetIndex() to remove any existing data in the index for the $type. It will then populate the index with the data returned by getData().
trans-unit.target: 当夹具被加载时，它将首先调用resetIndex（）来删除$ type索引中的任何现有数据。然后，它将使用getData（）返回的数据填充索引。

trans-unit.source: When the fixture is being loaded, it will first call resetCollection() to remove any existing data in the collection. It will then populate the collection with the data returned by getData().
trans-unit.target: 加载夹具时，它将首先调用resetCollection（）来删除集合中的任何现有数据。然后，它将使用getData（）返回的数据填充集合。

trans-unit.source: When the fixture is being loaded, it will first call resetIndex() to remove any existing data in the index. It will then populate the index with the data returned by getData().
trans-unit.target: 加载夹具时，它将首先调用resetIndex（）来删除索引中的任何现有数据。然后，它将使用getData（）返回的数据填充索引。

trans-unit.source: When the fixture is being loaded, it will first call resetTable() to remove any existing data in the table. It will then populate the table with the data returned by getData().
trans-unit.target: 加载夹具时，它将首先调用resetTable（）来删除表中的任何现有数据。然后，它将使用getData（）返回的数据填充表。

trans-unit.source: When the model is in the login scenario, all three attributes will be validated. However, only the username and password attributes can be massively assigned. To assign an input value to the secret attribute, you have to do it explicitly as follows,
trans-unit.target: 当模型处于 login 方案中时，将验证所有三个属性。但是，只能大规模分配 username 和 password 属性。要将输入值分配给 secret 属性，您必须按如下所示明确地进行操作，

trans-unit.source: When the pretty URL format is enabled, the URL manager uses the URL rules declared in its rules property to parse incoming requests and create URLs. In particular, to parse an incoming request, the URL manager examines the rules in the order they are declared and looks for the first rule that matches the requested URL. The matching rule is then used to parse the URL into a route and its associated parameters. Similarly, to create a URL, the URL manager looks for the first rule that matches the given route and parameters and uses that to create a URL.
trans-unit.target: 启用漂亮的URL格式后，URL管理器将使用在rules属性中声明的URL规则来解析传入的请求并创建URL。特别是，为了解析传入的请求，URL管理器按照声明的顺序检查规则，并查找与请求的URL匹配的第一条规则。然后使用匹配规则将URL解析为路由及其相关参数。同样，要创建URL，URL管理器将查找与给定路由和参数匹配的第一条规则，并使用该规则来创建URL。

trans-unit.source: When the rules are used to parse URLs:
trans-unit.target: 当规则被用来解析URL时。

trans-unit.source: When the select query doesn't provide the volume, the model will be able to calculate it automatically using the attributes of the model.
trans-unit.target: 当选择查询没有提供体积时,模型将能够利用模型的属性自动计算。

trans-unit.source: When the tables are specified as an array, you may also use the array keys as the table aliases (if a table does not need alias, do not use a string key).
trans-unit.target: 当表被指定为数组时,也可以使用数组键作为表的别名(如果表不需要别名,不要使用字符串键)。

trans-unit.source: When the user clicks on the CAPTCHA image, it will cause the CAPTCHA image to be refreshed with a new CAPTCHA.
trans-unit.target: 当用户点击验证码图片时,会导致验证码图片被刷新为新的验证码。

trans-unit.source: When the user has exceeded his rate limit, RateLimiter will throw a yii\web\TooManyRequestsHttpException exception.
trans-unit.target: 当用户超出其速率限制时，RateLimiter将引发yii \ web \ TooManyRequestsHttpException异常。

trans-unit.source: When there are too much data to be displayed on a single page, a common strategy is to display them in multiple pages and on each page only display a small portion of the data. This strategy is known as pagination.
trans-unit.target: 当太多数据无法在单个页面上显示时，一种常见的策略是将它们显示在多个页面上，而在每个页面上仅显示一小部分数据。这种策略称为分页。

trans-unit.source: When there can be name conflicts among different behaviors attached to the same component, the conflicts are automatically resolved by prioritizing the behavior attached to the component first. Name conflicts caused by different traits requires manual resolution by renaming the affected properties or methods.
trans-unit.target: 当连接到同一组件的不同行为之间可能存在名称冲突时,冲突会通过优先考虑连接到组件的行为来自动解决。由不同特性引起的名称冲突需要通过重命名受影响的属性或方法来手动解决。

trans-unit.source: When this event is triggered, the application instance has been configured and initialized. So it is a good place to insert your custom code via the event mechanism to intercept the request handling process. For example, in the event handler, you may dynamically set the yii\base\Application::$language property based on some parameters.
trans-unit.target: 触发此事件时，已配置并初始化了应用程序实例。因此，这是通过事件机制插入自定义代码以拦截请求处理过程的好地方。例如，在事件处理程序中，您可以根据一些参数动态设置yii \ base \ Application :: $ language属性。

trans-unit.source: When this event is triggered, the request handling is completed and you may take this chance to do some postprocessing of the request or customize the response.
trans-unit.target: 当这个事件被触发后,请求处理就完成了,你可以借此机会对请求进行一些后处理或者自定义响应。

trans-unit.source: When this is not set, it means caching is not enabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有设置,意味着没有启用缓存。

trans-unit.target: 当该方法用于验证多个模型时,该参数将被解释为一个模型。

trans-unit.source: When this property is not set (null) the filtering feature is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性未设置(空)时,过滤功能将被禁用。

trans-unit.target: 何时注册依赖关系

trans-unit.source: When translating a message, you can embed some placeholders and have them replaced by dynamic parameter values. You can even use special placeholder syntax to have the parameter values formatted according to the target language. In this subsection, we will describe different ways of formatting messages.
trans-unit.target: 当翻译一条消息时,您可以嵌入一些占位符,并由动态参数值替换它们。您甚至可以使用特殊的占位符语法,让参数值根据目标语言进行格式化。在本小节中,我们将介绍不同的消息格式化方式。

trans-unit.source: When using addCssStyle(), you can specify either an array of key-value pairs, corresponding to CSS property names and values, or a string such as width: 100px; height: 200px;. These formats can be converted from one to the other using cssStyleFromArray() and cssStyleToArray(). The removeCssStyle() method accepts an array of properties to remove. If it's a single property, it can be specified as a string.
trans-unit.target: 使用addCssStyle（）时，可以指定与CSS属性名称和值相对应的键/值对数组，也可以指定诸如 width: 100px; height: 200px; 的字符串。高度：200px；。可以使用cssStyleFromArray（）和cssStyleToArray（）将这些格式从一种格式转换为另一种格式。所述removeCssStyle（）方法接受性质，以除去的阵列。如果是单个属性，则可以将其指定为字符串。

trans-unit.source: When using yii\helpers\Json::encode() or yii\helpers\Json::htmlEncode() to encode a value, JsonExpression objects will be specially handled and encoded as a JavaScript expression instead of a string.
trans-unit.target: 当使用yii \ helpers \ Json :: encode（）或yii \ helpers \ Json :: htmlEncode（）对值进行编码时，将对JsonExpression对象进行特殊处理并将其编码为JavaScript表达式而不是字符串。

trans-unit.source: When using DbCache in a production server, we recommend you create a DB index for the 'expire' column in the cache table to improve the performance.
trans-unit.target: 当在生产服务器中使用DbCache时,我们建议你为缓存表中的 "expire "列创建一个DB索引以提高性能。

trans-unit.source: When using DbSession in a production server, we recommend you create a DB index for the 'expire' column in the session table to improve the performance.
trans-unit.target: 当在生产服务器中使用DbSession时,我们建议你为session表中的'expire'列创建一个DB索引以提高性能。

trans-unit.source: When using Gii, if you have already created the same file and would be overwriting it, click the diff button next to the file name to see the differences between the code to be generated and the existing version.
trans-unit.target: 使用Gii时，如果您已经创建了相同的文件并且将其覆盖，请单击文件名旁边的 diff 按钮以查看要生成的代码与现有版本之间的区别。

trans-unit.source: When using Yii DAO, you mainly need to deal with plain SQLs and PHP arrays. As a result, it is the most efficient way to access databases. However, because SQL syntax may vary for different databases, using Yii DAO also means you have to take extra effort to create a database-agnostic application.
trans-unit.target: 当使用Yii DAO时,你主要需要处理纯SQL和PHP数组。因此,它是访问数据库最有效的方式。然而,由于SQL语法可能会在不同的数据库中有所不同,使用Yii DAO也意味着你必须花费额外的精力来创建一个与数据库无关的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: When using fragment caching, you may encounter the situation where a large fragment of content is relatively static except at one or a few places. For example, a page header may display the main menu bar together with the name of the current user. Another problem is that the content being cached may contain PHP code that must be executed for every request (e.g. the code for registering an asset bundle). Both problems can be solved by the so-called dynamic content feature.
trans-unit.target: 使用片段缓存时，您可能会遇到这样的情况，其中大的内容片段相对静态，除了一个或几个位置。例如，页面标题可以显示主菜单栏以及当前用户的名称。另一个问题是，正在缓存的内容可能包含必须为每个请求执行的PHP代码（例如，用于注册资产捆绑包的代码）。这两个问题都可以通过所谓的动态内容功能来解决。

trans-unit.source: When using parameter binding, you may call params() or addParams() to specify parameters separately.
trans-unit.target: 使用参数绑定时，可以调用params（）或addParams（）分别指定参数。

trans-unit.source: When using the Basic Project Template, you may put your classes under the top-level namespace app so that they can be autoloaded by Yii without the need of defining a new alias. This is because @app is a predefined alias, and a class name like app\components\MyClass can be resolved into the class file AppBasePath/components/MyClass.php, according to the algorithm just described.
trans-unit.target: 当使用Basic Project Template时，您可以将您的类放在顶级名称空间 app 以便Yii可以自动加载它们，而无需定义新别名。这是因为 @app 是预定义的别名，并且根据刚才描述的算法，可以将诸如 app\components\MyClass 类的类名称解析为类文件 AppBasePath/components/MyClass.php 。

trans-unit.source: When using the Yii autoloader together with other autoloaders, you should include the Yii.php file after all other autoloaders are installed. This will make the Yii autoloader the first one responding to any class autoloading request. For example, the following code is extracted from the entry script of the Basic Project Template. trans-unit.source: When using the default URL format, parsing a request into a route is as simple as getting the value of a GET query parameter named r.
trans-unit.target: 使用默认URL格式时，将请求解析为路由就像获取名为 r 的 GET 查询参数的值一样简单。

trans-unit.source: When using the pretty URL format, the URL manager will examine the registered URL rules to find matching one that can resolve the request into a route. If such a rule cannot be found, a yii\web\NotFoundHttpException exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 使用漂亮的URL格式时，URL管理器将检查已注册的URL规则，以找到可以将请求解析为路由的匹配规则。如果找不到这样的规则，则会抛出yii \ web \ NotFoundHttpException异常。

trans-unit.source: When using this configuration, you should also set cgi.fix_pathinfo=0 in the php.ini file in order to avoid many unnecessary system stat() calls.
trans-unit.target: 使用此配置时，还应在 php.ini 文件中设置 cgi.fix_pathinfo=0 ，以避免发生许多不必要的系统 stat() 调用。

trans-unit.source: When working with applications that need to support multiple languages, you often need to specify different date and time formats for different locales. To simplify this task, you may use format shortcuts (e.g. long, short), instead. The formatter will turn a format shortcut into an appropriate format according to the currently active locale. The following format shortcuts are supported (the examples assume en_GB is the active locale):

trans-unit.source: When working with large amounts of data, methods such as yii\db\Query::all() are not suitable because they require loading the whole query result into the client's memory. To solve this issue Yii provides batch query support. The server holds the query result, and the client uses a cursor to iterate over the result set one batch at a time.
trans-unit.target: 当处理大量数据时，诸如yii \ db \ Query :: all（）之类的方法不合适，因为它们需要将整个查询结果加载到客户端的内存中。为了解决这个问题，Yii提供了批处理查询支持。服务器保存查询结果，而客户端使用游标一次遍历一批结果。

trans-unit.source: When you access a relation property for the first time, a SQL statement will be executed, like shown in the above example. If the same property is accessed again, the previous result will be returned without re-executing the SQL statement. To force re-executing the SQL statement, you should unset the relation property first: unset($customer->orders).
trans-unit.target: 首次访问关系属性时，将执行一条SQL语句，如上面的示例所示。如果再次访问相同的属性，则将返回先前的结果，而无需重新执行SQL语句。要强制重新执行SQL语句，应首先取消设置关系属性： unset($customer->orders) 。

trans-unit.source: When you are reading and sending cookies through the request and response components as shown in the last two subsections, you enjoy the added security of cookie validation which protects cookies from being modified on the client-side. This is achieved by signing each cookie with a hash string, which allows the application to tell if a cookie has been modified on the client-side. If so, the cookie will NOT be accessible through the cookie collection of the request component.
trans-unit.target: 如最后两个小节所示，当您通过 request 和 response 组件读取和发送cookie时，您会享受cookie验证的额外安全性，从而保护cookie不会在客户端被修改。这是通过用散列字符串签名每个cookie来实现的，该哈希字符串使应用程序可以知道cookie是否已在客户端被修改。如果是这样，cookie将无法通过访问Cookie集合中的 request 组件。

trans-unit.source: When you call save() to save an Active Record instance, only dirty attributes are being saved. An attribute is considered dirty if its value has been modified since it was loaded from DB or saved to DB most recently. Note that data validation will be performed regardless if the Active Record instance has dirty attributes or not.
trans-unit.target: 当您调用save（）保存Active Record实例时，仅保存脏属性。如果某个属性的值自从数据库加载或最近保存到数据库以来已被修改，则该属性被视为脏属性。请注意，无论Active Record实例是否具有脏属性，都将执行数据验证。

trans-unit.source: When you call save(), by default it will call validate() automatically. Only when the validation passes, will it actually save the data; otherwise it will simply return false, and you can check the errors property to retrieve the validation error messages.
trans-unit.target: 当您调用save（）时，默认情况下它将自动调用validate（）。只有当验证通过时，它才会真正保存数据；否则，它将仅返回 false ，您可以检查errors属性以检索验证错误消息。

trans-unit.source: When you include multiple CSS or JavaScript files in a Web page, they have to follow a certain order to avoid overriding issues. For example, if you are using a jQuery UI widget in a Web page, you have to make sure the jQuery JavaScript file is included before the jQuery UI JavaScript file. We call such ordering the dependencies among assets.
trans-unit.target: 当你在一个网页中包含多个CSS或JavaScript文件时,它们必须遵循一定的顺序,以避免覆盖问题。例如,如果你在网页中使用jQuery UI widget,你必须确保jQuery JavaScript文件被包含在jQuery UI JavaScript文件之前。我们把这种排序称为资产之间的依赖关系。

trans-unit.source: When you need to invalidate all the stored cache data, you can call yii\caching\Cache::flush().
trans-unit.target: 当需要使所有存储的缓存数据无效时，可以调用yii \ caching \ Cache :: flush（）。

trans-unit.source: When you register such an asset bundle with a view, the asset manager will automatically run the pre-processor tools to convert assets in recognized extended syntax into CSS/JavaScript. When the view finally renders a page, it will include the CSS/JavaScript files in the page, instead of the original assets in extended syntax.
trans-unit.target: 在视图中注册此类资产捆绑包时，资产管理器将自动运行预处理器工具，以将公认的扩展语法将资产转换为CSS / JavaScript。当视图最终呈现页面时，它将在页面中包含CSS / JavaScript文件，而不是扩展语法中的原始资产。

trans-unit.source: When you render a view, you can specify the view using either a view name or a view file path/alias. In most cases, you would use the former because it is more concise and flexible. We call views specified using names as named views.
trans-unit.target: 渲染视图时，可以使用视图名称或视图文件路径/别名来指定视图。在大多数情况下，您会使用前者，因为它更简洁，更灵活。我们将使用名称指定的视图称为命名视图。

trans-unit.source: Whether the comparison between the attribute value and $requiredValue is strict. When this is true, both the values and types must match. Defaults to false, meaning only the values need to match. Note that when $requiredValue is null, if this property is true, the validator will check if the attribute value is null; If this property is false, the validator will call isEmpty() to check if the attribute value is empty.

trans-unit.source: Whether to allow caching the result of access check. When this parameter is true (default), if the access check of an operation was performed before, its result will be directly returned when calling this method to check the same operation. If this parameter is false, this method will always call yii\rbac\CheckAccessInterface::checkAccess() to obtain the up-to-date access result. Note that this caching is effective only within the same request and only works when $params = [].
trans-unit.target: 是否允许缓存访问检查结果。当此参数为true（默认值）时，如果之前执行过操作的访问检查，则在调用此方法检查同一操作时将直接返回其结果。如果此参数为false，则此方法将始终调用yii \ rbac \ CheckAccessInterface :: checkAccess（）以获取最新的访问结果。请注意，此缓存仅在同一请求中有效，并且仅在 $params = [] 。

This parameter is available since version 2.0.1.
trans-unit.target: 是否还检查日期/时间值是否附加了一些时间和日期信息。默认为 false 。如果为 true ，则该方法将返回一个数组，其中第一个元素是规范化的时间戳，第二个是指示时间戳是否具有时间信息的布尔值，第三个是指示时间戳是否具有日期信息的布尔值。此参数自版本2.0.1起可用。

trans-unit.source: Whether to append a timestamp to the URL of every published asset. When this is true, the URL of a published asset may look like /path/to/asset?v=timestamp, where timestamp is the last modification time of the published asset file. You normally would want to set this property to true when you have enabled HTTP caching for assets, because it allows you to bust caching when the assets are updated.
trans-unit.target: 是否在每个已发布资产的URL上附加时间戳。如果为真，则已发布资产的URL可能类似于 /path/to/asset?v=timestamp ，其中 timestamp 是已发布资产文件的最后修改时间。通常，在为资产启用HTTP缓存时，您希望将此属性设置为true，因为它允许您在资产更新时取消缓存。

trans-unit.source: Whether to append new event handler to the end of the existing handler list. If false, the new handler will be inserted at the beginning of the existing handler list.
trans-unit.target: 是否将新事件处理程序追加到现有处理程序列表的末尾。如果为 false ，则新处理程序将插入到现有处理程序列表的开头。

trans-unit.source: Whether to append new event handler to the end of the existing handler list. If false, the new handler will be inserted at the beginning of the existing handler list.

You need to use search() method in order to fetch 'meta' results.
trans-unit.target: 是否自动对主查询执行“ SHOW META”查询。您可以将该值设置为字符串或yii \ db \ Expression实例，在这种情况下，其值将用作“ SHOW META”语句的“ LIKE”条件。您需要使用search（）方法来获取“元”结果。

trans-unit.target: 是否自动使控制器的URL名称复数。如果为true，则控制器ID将以复数形式出现在URL中。例如， user 控制器将在URL中显示为 users 。

trans-unit.source: Whether to automatically renew authentication status if it has not been done so before. This is only useful when $enableSession is true.
trans-unit.target: 如果之前未自动更新身份验证状态，是否进行更新。仅在$ enableSession为true 时才有用。

trans-unit.source: Whether to automatically renew the identity cookie each time a page is requested.
trans-unit.target: 是否在每次请求页面时自动更新身份cookie。

trans-unit.source: Whether to automatically renew the identity cookie each time a page is requested. This property is effective only when $enableAutoLogin is true. When this is false, the identity cookie will expire after the specified duration since the user is initially logged in. When this is true, the identity cookie will expire after the specified duration since the user visits the site the last time.
trans-unit.target: 是否在每次请求页面时自动更新身份cookie。仅当$ enableAutoLogin为 true 时，此属性才有效。如果为 false ，则身份Cookie将在用户最初登录后的指定时间段后过期。如果为 true ，则身份Cookie将在用户最后一次访问站点后的指定时间段后过期。

trans-unit.source: Whether to automatically upgrade short-live (2 hours) access token to long-live (60 days) one, after fetching it.

trans-unit.source: Whether to cache or not, return an array instead of true to store an additional data.

trans-unit.source: Whether to call clearErrors() before performing validation

trans-unit.source: Whether to capitalize the first letter in each word

trans-unit.source: Whether to check file type (extension) with mime-type.
trans-unit.target: 是否用mime-type检查文件类型(扩展名)。

trans-unit.source: Whether to check file type (extension) with mime-type. If extension produced by file mime-type check differs from uploaded file extension, the file will be considered as invalid.
trans-unit.target: 是否用mime-type检查文件类型(扩展名)。通过文件类型检查产生的扩展名与上传的文件扩展名不同时,文件将被视为无效。

trans-unit.source: Whether to check if $page is within valid range.
trans-unit.target: 是否检查$ page是否在有效范围内。

trans-unit.source: Whether to check if $page is within valid range. When this property is true, the value of $page will always be between 0 and ($pageCount-1). Because $pageCount relies on the correct value of $totalCount which may not be available in some cases (e.g. MongoDB), you may want to set this property to be false to disable the page number validation. By doing so, $page will return the value indexed by $pageParam in $params.
trans-unit.target: 是否检查$ page是否在有效范围内。当此属性为true时，$ page的值将始终介于0和（$ pageCount -1）之间。由于$ pageCount依赖于$ totalCount的正确值（在某些情况下可能不可用）（例如MongoDB），因此您可能希望将此属性设置为false以禁用页码验证。这样，$ page将返回$ pageParam在$ params中索引的值。

trans-unit.source: Whether to check if the request accepts HTML responses. Defaults to true. When this is true and the request does not accept HTML responses the current URL will not be SET as the return URL. Also instead of redirecting the user an ForbiddenHttpException is thrown. This parameter is available since version 2.0.8.
trans-unit.target: 是否检查请求是否接受HTML响应。默认为 true 。如果为true，并且请求不接受HTML响应，则不会将当前URL设置为返回URL。同样，不是重定向用户，而是抛出ForbiddenHttpException。此参数自版本2.0.8起可用。

trans-unit.source: Whether to check if the request is an AJAX request. When this is true and the request is an AJAX request, the current URL (for AJAX request) will NOT be set as the return URL.
trans-unit.target: 是否检查该请求是否为AJAX请求。当此选项为真且请求为AJAX请求时,当前的URL(AJAX请求)将不被设置为返回URL。

trans-unit.source: Whether to check if the singleton has been instantiated.

trans-unit.source: Whether to check whether the email's domain exists and has either an A or MX record.
trans-unit.target: 检查邮件的域名是否存在,是否有A或MX记录。

trans-unit.source: Whether to check whether the email's domain exists and has either an A or MX record. Be aware that this check can fail due to temporary DNS problems even if the email address is valid and an email would be deliverable. Defaults to false.
trans-unit.target: 检查电子邮件的域名是否存在,是否有A或MX记录。请注意,即使电子邮件地址是有效的,并且电子邮件可以投递,这项检查也可能因为临时的DNS问题而失败。默认为false。

trans-unit.source: Whether to close other items if an item is opened.

trans-unit.source: Whether to continue rendering the view file.

trans-unit.source: Whether to create an absolute URL. Defaults to false.

If that method returns null, even if this property is true, no client-side validation will be done by this validator.
trans-unit.target: 是否为此验​​证器启用客户端验证。实际的客户端验证是通过clientValidateAttribute（）返回的JavaScript代码完成的。如果该方法返回null，则即使此属性为true，此验证器也不会进行客户端验证。

trans-unit.source: Whether to enable conversion of the float query params into the direct literal SQL insertion. This allows processing of the float values, since PDO does not provide specific param type for float binding, while Sphinx is unable to process float values passed as quoted strings.
trans-unit.target: 是否启用将浮点查询参数转换为SQL直接插入的文字。这允许处理浮点值,因为PDO没有为浮点绑定提供特定的参数类型,而Sphinx无法处理以引号字符串形式传递的浮点值。

trans-unit.source: Whether to enable logging of database queries. Defaults to true. You may want to disable this option in a production environment to gain performance if you do not need the information being logged.
trans-unit.target: 是否启用数据库查询的日志记录。默认为 "true"。如果您不需要记录信息,您可能希望在生产环境中禁用此选项以获得性能。

trans-unit.source: Whether to enable message logging for the requests about debug module actions.

trans-unit.source: Whether to enable message logging for the requests about debug module actions. You normally do not want to keep these logs because they may distract you from the logs about your applications. You may want to enable the debug logs if you want to investigate how the debug module itself works.
trans-unit.target: 是否启用关于调试模块操作的请求的消息日志。通常情况下,您不希望保留这些日志,因为它们可能会分散您对应用程序日志的注意力。如果你想研究调试模块本身是如何工作的,你可能需要启用调试日志。

trans-unit.source: Whether to enable pretty URLs.
trans-unit.target: 是否启用漂亮的URL。

trans-unit.source: Whether to enable pretty URLs. Instead of putting all parameters in the query string part of a URL, pretty URLs allow using path info to represent some of the parameters and can thus produce more user-friendly URLs, such as "/news/Yii-is-released", instead of "/index.php?r=news%2Fview&id=100".
trans-unit.target: 是否启用漂亮的URL。漂亮的URL无需将所有参数都放在URL的查询字符串部分中，而是允许使用路径信息来表示某些参数，从而可以生成更加用户友好的URL，例如“ / news / Yii-is-released” //index.php?r=news%2Fview&id=100”。

trans-unit.source: Whether to enable profiling of database queries.
trans-unit.target: 是否启用数据库查询的剖析。

trans-unit.source: Whether to enable profiling of database queries. Defaults to true. You may want to disable this option in a production environment to gain performance if you do not need the information being logged.
trans-unit.target: 是否启用数据库查询的剖析。默认为 "true"。如果您不需要记录信息,您可能希望在生产环境中禁用此选项以获得性能。

trans-unit.source: Whether to enable profiling the commands and queries being executed.

trans-unit.target: 是否启用概要分析正在执行的命令和查询。如果禁用$ enableLogging，此选项将无效。

trans-unit.target: 是否启用查询缓存。请注意，为了启用查询缓存，必须启用$ queryCache指定的有效缓存组件，并且必须将$ enableQueryCache设置为true。同样，仅缓存在cache（）中的查询结果将被缓存。

trans-unit.source: Whether to enable read/write splitting by using $slaves to read data.

trans-unit.source: Whether to enable schema caching.
trans-unit.target: 是否启用模式缓存。

trans-unit.target: 是否启用模式缓存。请注意，为了启用真正的模式缓存，必须启用$ schemaCache指定的有效缓存组件，并且必须将$ enableSchemaCache设置为true。

trans-unit.source: Whether to enable strict (===) comparison.

trans-unit.source: Whether to enable strict parsing.
trans-unit.target: 是否启用严格解析。

trans-unit.source: Whether to enable strict parsing. If strict parsing is enabled, the incoming requested URL must match at least one of the $rules in order to be treated as a valid request. Otherwise, the path info part of the request will be treated as the requested route. This property is used only when $enablePrettyUrl is true.
trans-unit.target: 是否启用严格解析。如果启用了严格解析，则传入的请求URL必须至少匹配$ rules之一，才能被视为有效请求。否则，请求的路径信息部分将被视为请求的路由。仅当$ enablePrettyUrl为 true 时，才使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: Whether to enable the commands provided by the core framework.

trans-unit.target: 是否启用使用Yii日志机制写入SwiftMailer内部日志。如果启用，则yii \ swiftmailer \ Logger插件将附加到$ transport上。

trans-unit.source: Whether to enclose the checkbox within the label. If true, the method will still use $template to layout the checkbox and the error message except that the checkbox is enclosed by the label tag.
trans-unit.target: 是否将复选框包含在标签内。如果为 true ，则该方法仍将使用$ template来布局复选框和错误消息，但该复选框由label标签包围。

trans-unit.source: Whether to enclose the radio within the label. If true, the method will still use $template to layout the radio button and the error message except that the radio is enclosed by the label tag.
trans-unit.target: 是否将收音机包裹在标签内。如果为 true ，则该方法将仍然使用$ template来布置单选按钮和错误消息，但单选按钮由label标签包围。

trans-unit.source: Whether to encode HTML entities in $content. If false, HTML entities in $content will not be further encoded.
trans-unit.target: 是否在 $content 编码HTML实体。如果为false，则 $content HTML实体将不会进一步编码。

trans-unit.source: Whether to encode array values only. If false, both the array keys and array values will be encoded.
trans-unit.target: 是否只对数组值进行编码。如果为false,则数组键和数组值都将被编码。

trans-unit.source: Whether to enforce registration even wrapper has been already registered.
trans-unit.target: 即使包装物已经注册,是否也要执行注册。

trans-unit.source: Whether to enforce the garbage collection regardless of $gcProbability. Defaults to false, meaning the actual deletion happens with the probability as specified by $gcProbability.
trans-unit.target: 是否执行垃圾回收，而与$ gcProbability无关。默认为false，表示实际删除发生的可能性由$ gcProbability指定。

trans-unit.source: Whether to enforce the garbage collection regardless of $gcProbability. Defaults to false, meaning the actual deletion happens with the probability as specified by $gcProbability.
trans-unit.target: 是否执行垃圾回收，而与$ gcProbability无关。默认为false，表示实际删除发生的可能性由$ gcProbability指定。

trans-unit.source: Whether to enforce the garbage collection regardless of $gcProbability. Defaults to false, meaning the actual deletion happens with the probability as specified by $gcProbability.
trans-unit.target: 是否执行垃圾回收，而与$ gcProbability无关。默认为false，表示实际删除发生的可能性由$ gcProbability指定。

trans-unit.source: Whether to ensure generated slug value to be unique among owner class records.
trans-unit.target: 是否确保生成的slug值在所有者类记录中是唯一的。

trans-unit.source: Whether to ensure generated slug value to be unique among owner class records. If enabled behavior will validate slug uniqueness automatically. If validation fails it will attempt generating unique slug value from based one until success.
trans-unit.target: 是否确保生成的slug值在所有者类记录中是唯一的。如果启用,行为将自动验证slug的唯一性。如果验证失败,它将尝试从基础的Slug值中生成唯一的Slug值,直到成功。

trans-unit.source: Whether to expand an IPv6 address to the full notation format.
trans-unit.target: 是否将IPv6地址扩展为完整的符号格式。

trans-unit.source: Whether to expand an IPv6 address to the full notation format. Defaults to false.
trans-unit.target: 是否将IPv6地址扩展为完整的符号格式。默认为 false 。

trans-unit.source: Whether to fetch all rows or only first one.
trans-unit.target: 是取所有行还是只取第一行。

trans-unit.source: Whether to fetch the latest available index names. If this is false, index names fetched previously (if available) will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 是否获取最新的可用索引名称。如果为false,则会返回之前取回的索引名(如果有的话)。

trans-unit.source: Whether to fetch the latest available index schemas. If this is false, cached data may be returned if available.
trans-unit.target: 是否获取最新的可用索引模式。如果为false,则可能返回缓存数据(如果可用)。

trans-unit.source: Whether to fetch the latest available index types. If this is false, index types fetched previously (if available) will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 是否获取最新的可用索引类型。如果为false,则返回之前获取的索引类型(如果可用)。

trans-unit.source: Whether to fetch the latest available schema names. If this is false, schema names fetched previously (if available) will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 是否获取最新的模式名。如果为false,则会返回之前获取的模式名(如果有的话)。

trans-unit.source: Whether to fetch the latest available table names. If this is false, table names fetched previously (if available) will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 是否获取最新的可用表名。如果为false,则会返回之前取回的表名(如果有的话)。

trans-unit.source: Whether to fetch the latest available table schemas. If this is false, cached data may be returned if available.
trans-unit.target: 是否获取最新的可用表模式。如果为false,则可能返回缓存数据(如果有)。

trans-unit.source: Whether to fetch the latest available view names. If this is false, view names fetched previously (if available) will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 是否获取最新的可用视图名称。如果为false,则会返回之前获取的视图名称(如果有的话)。

trans-unit.source: Whether to force checking and not re-use cached size value. This is useful to detect changing window size while the application is running but may not get up to date values on every terminal.
trans-unit.target: 是否强制检查和不重复使用缓存的大小值。这对于在应用程序运行时检测窗口大小的变化很有用,但可能无法在每个终端上获得最新的值。

trans-unit.source: Whether to force data preparation even if it has been done before.
trans-unit.target: 是否要强行准备数据,即使之前已经做过了。

trans-unit.source: Whether to force message translation when the source and target languages are the same.
trans-unit.target: 当源语言和目标语言相同时,是否要强制进行消息翻译。

trans-unit.source: Whether to force message translation when the source and target languages are the same. Defaults to false, meaning translation is only performed when source and target languages are different.
trans-unit.target: 是否在源语言和目标语言相同时强制进行消息翻译。默认值为false,即只有在源语言和目标语言不同时才进行翻译。

trans-unit.source: Whether to force refresh of screen size. This will be passed to getScreenSize().
trans-unit.target: 是否强制刷新屏幕大小。这将传递给getScreenSize（）。

trans-unit.source: Whether to format the output in a readable "pretty" format.
trans-unit.target: 是否以可读的 "漂亮 "格式进行输出。

trans-unit.source: Whether to format the output in a readable "pretty" format. This can be useful for debugging purpose. If this is true, JSON_PRETTY_PRINT will be added to $encodeOptions. Defaults to false. This property has no effect, when $useJsonp is true.
trans-unit.target: 是否将输出格式化为可读的“漂亮”格式。这对于调试目的很有用。如果为真， JSON_PRETTY_PRINT 添加到$ encodeOptions中。默认为 false 。当$ useJsonp为 true 时，此属性无效。

trans-unit.source: Whether to generate a new slug if it has already been generated before.
trans-unit.target: 如果之前已经生成了一个新的slug,是否要生成一个新的slug。

trans-unit.source: Whether to generate a new slug if it has already been generated before. If true, the behavior will not generate a new slug even if $attribute is changed.
trans-unit.target: 如果以前已经生成过新的段，则是否生成。如果为true，则即使$ attribute更改，该行为也不会生成新的信息。

trans-unit.source: Whether to generate an ID if it is not set previously
trans-unit.target: 如果之前没有设置,是否要生成ID。

trans-unit.source: Whether to generate weak ETags.
trans-unit.target: 是否生成弱ETag。

trans-unit.source: Whether to hide empty menu items.
trans-unit.target: 是否隐藏空菜单项。

trans-unit.source: Whether to hide empty menu items. An empty menu item is one whose url option is not set and which has no visible child menu items.
trans-unit.target: 是否隐藏空菜单项。空菜单项是未设置 url 选项且没有可见子菜单项的菜单项。

trans-unit.source: Whether to hook up yii.activeForm JavaScript plugin. This property must be set true if you want to support client validation and/or AJAX validation, or if you want to take advantage of the yii.activeForm plugin. When this is false, the form will not generate any JavaScript.
trans-unit.target: 是否连接 yii.activeForm JavaScript插件。如果要支持客户端验证和/或AJAX验证，或者要利用 yii.activeForm 插件，则必须将此属性设置为 true 。如果为 false ，则表单将不会生成任何JavaScript。

trans-unit.source: Whether to hook up `yii.
trans-unit.target: 是否勾搭`yii。

trans-unit.source: Whether to ignore internal collection instance cache.
trans-unit.target: 是否忽略内部收集实例缓存。

trans-unit.source: Whether to include rate limit headers in the response
trans-unit.target: 是否在响应中包含速率限制头。

trans-unit.source: Whether to insert a separator between two consecutive uppercase chars, defaults to false
trans-unit.target: 是否在两个连续的大写字母之间插入分隔符,默认为false。

trans-unit.source: Whether to interpret objects implementing the Traversable interface as arrays.
trans-unit.target: 是否将实现Traversable接口的对象解释为数组。

trans-unit.source: Whether to interpret objects implementing the Traversable interface as arrays. Defaults to true.
trans-unit.target: 是否将实现Traversable接口的对象解释为数组。默认为 true 。

trans-unit.source: Whether to invert the validation logic.
trans-unit.target: 是否反转验证逻辑。

trans-unit.source: Whether to invert the validation logic. Defaults to false. If set to true, the attribute value should NOT be among the list of values defined via $range.
trans-unit.target: 是否反转验证逻辑。默认为false。如果设置为true，则属性值不应位于通过$ range定义的值列表中。

trans-unit.source: Whether to invert the validation logic. Defaults to false. If set to true, the regular expression defined via $pattern should NOT match the attribute value.
trans-unit.target: 是否反转验证逻辑。默认为false。如果设置为true，则通过$ pattern定义的正则表达式不应与属性值匹配。

trans-unit.source: Whether to keep the prefix that has been specified for the progressbar when progressbar gets removed. Defaults to true.
trans-unit.target: 当进度条被删除时,是否保留已经为进度条指定的前缀。默认为 "true"。

trans-unit.source: Whether to load the module if it is not yet loaded.
trans-unit.target: 如果还没有加载模块,是否要加载。

trans-unit.source: Whether to log command and query executions.
trans-unit.target: 是否记录命令和查询的执行情况。

trans-unit.source: Whether to log command and query executions. When enabled this option may reduce performance. MongoDB commands may contain large data, consuming both CPU and memory. It makes sense to disable this option in the production environment.
trans-unit.target: 是否记录命令和查询的执行情况。启用该选项后,可能会降低性能。MongoDB命令可能包含大量数据,消耗CPU和内存。在生产环境中禁用该选项是明智的。

trans-unit.source: Whether to maintain the array keys. If false, the resulting array will be re-indexed with integers.
trans-unit.target: 是否保留数组的键。如果为false,结果将用整数重新索引数组。

trans-unit.source: Whether to make this a UNIQUE index constraint. You can pass true or INDEX_UNIQUE to create a unique index, false to make a non-unique index using the default index type, or one of the following constants to specify the index method to use: INDEX_B_TREE, INDEX_HASH, INDEX_GIST, INDEX_GIN.
trans-unit.target: 是否使其成为UNIQUE索引约束。您可以传递 true 或INDEX_UNIQUE来创建唯一索引，传递 false 来使用默认索引类型创建非唯一索引，或者传递以下常量之一以指定要使用的索引方法：INDEX_B_TREE，INDEX_HASH，INDEX_GIST，INDEX_GIN。

trans-unit.source: Whether to mark messages that no longer appear in the source code.
trans-unit.target: 是否对源码中不再出现的消息进行标记。

trans-unit.source: Whether to mark messages that no longer appear in the source code. Defaults to true, which means each of these messages will be enclosed with a pair of '@@' marks.
trans-unit.target: 是否标记那些不再出现在源代码中的消息。默认值为true,这意味着每条消息都会用一对'@@'标记。

trans-unit.source: Whether to only remove expired cache files. If false, all files under $path will be removed.
trans-unit.target: 是否仅删除过期的缓存文件。如果为false，将删除 $path 下的所有文件。

trans-unit.source: Whether to only return the first header of the specified name. If false, all headers of the specified name will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 是否只返回指定名称的第一个头。如果为false,将返回指定名称的所有头。

trans-unit.source: Whether to overwrite all existing code files when in non-interactive mode.
trans-unit.target: 在非交互模式下,是否覆盖所有现有代码文件。

trans-unit.source: Whether to overwrite all existing code files when in non-interactive mode. Defaults to false, meaning none of the existing code files will be overwritten. This option is used only when --interactive=0.
trans-unit.target: 在非交互模式下是否覆盖所有现有代码文件。默认值为false，表示现有代码文件均不会被覆盖。仅当 --interactive=0 时使用此选项。

trans-unit.source: Whether to overwrite existing CSS properties if the new style contain them too.
trans-unit.target: 如果新的样式也包含了现有的CSS属性,是否要覆盖它们。

trans-unit.source: Whether to perform encoding on the error summary.
trans-unit.target: 是否对错误摘要进行编码。

trans-unit.source: Whether to perform typecasting after owner model validation.
trans-unit.target: 是否在业主模型验证后进行类型化。

trans-unit.source: Whether to perform typecasting after owner model validation. Note that typecasting will be performed only if validation was successful, e.g. owner model has no errors. Note that changing this option value will have no effect after this behavior has been attached to the model.
trans-unit.target: 是否在所有者模型验证后执行类型转换。请注意,只有在验证成功的情况下才会执行类型转换,例如所有者模型没有错误。请注意,在此行为被附加到模型后,更改此选项值将不会有任何影响。

trans-unit.source: Whether to perform typecasting after retrieving owner model data from the database (after find or refresh).
trans-unit.target: 从数据库中检索出所有者模型数据后,是否要进行类型化处理(查找或刷新后)。

trans-unit.source: Whether to perform typecasting after retrieving owner model data from the database (after find or refresh). This option may be disabled in order to achieve better performance. For example, in case of yii\db\ActiveRecord usage, typecasting after find will grant no benefit in most cases an thus can be disabled. Note that changing this option value will have no effect after this behavior has been attached to the model.
trans-unit.target: 从数据库中检索所有者模型数据之后（查找或刷新之后）是否执行类型转换。为了获得更好的性能，可以禁用此选项。例如，在使用yii \ db \ ActiveRecord的情况下，在大多数情况下，find之后的类型转换将不会带来任何好处，因此可以将其禁用。请注意，将此行为附加到模型后，更改此选项值将无效。

trans-unit.source: Whether to perform typecasting before saving owner model (insert or update).
trans-unit.target: 是否在保存所有者模型之前进行类型转换(插入或更新)。

trans-unit.source: Whether to perform typecasting before saving owner model (insert or update). This option may be disabled in order to achieve better performance. For example, in case of yii\db\ActiveRecord usage, typecasting before save will grant no benefit an thus can be disabled. Note that changing this option value will have no effect after this behavior has been attached to the model.
trans-unit.target: 在保存所有者模型（插入或更新）之前是否执行类型转换。为了获得更好的性能，可以禁用此选项。例如，如果使用yii \ db \ ActiveRecord，则在保存之前进行类型转换不会带来任何好处，因此可以禁用它。请注意，将此行为附加到模型后，更改此选项值将无效。

trans-unit.source: Whether to perform validation (calling validate()) before saving the record. Defaults to true. If the validation fails, the record will not be saved to the database and this method will return false.
trans-unit.target: 保存记录之前是否执行验证（调用validate（））。默认为 true 。如果验证失败，则记录将不会保存到数据库，并且此方法将返回 false 。

trans-unit.source: Whether to perform validation before saving the record. If the validation fails, the record will not be inserted into the collection.
trans-unit.target: 是否在保存记录前执行验证。如果验证失败,记录将不会被插入到集合中。

trans-unit.source: Whether to perform validation before saving the record. If the validation fails, the record will not be inserted into the database.
trans-unit.target: 是否在保存记录前进行验证。如果验证失败,记录将不会被插入数据库。

trans-unit.source: Whether to perform validation before saving the record. If the validation fails, the record will not be inserted.
trans-unit.target: 是否在保存记录前进行验证。如果验证失败,记录将不会被插入。

trans-unit.source: Whether to perform validation when an input field loses focus.
trans-unit.target: 当输入字段失去焦点时,是否要执行验证。

trans-unit.source: Whether to perform validation when an input field loses focus. If yii\widgets\ActiveField::$validateOnBlur is set, its value will take precedence for that input field.
trans-unit.target: 输入字段失去焦点时是否执行验证。如果设置了yii \ widgets \ ActiveField :: $ validateOnBlur，则该值将优先于该输入字段。

trans-unit.source: Whether to perform validation when the form is submitted.
trans-unit.target: 是否在提交表单时进行验证。

trans-unit.source: Whether to perform validation when the input field loses focus.
trans-unit.target: 当输入字段失去焦点时,是否要执行验证。

trans-unit.source: Whether to perform validation when the input field loses focus. If not set, it will take the value of yii\widgets\ActiveForm::$validateOnBlur.
trans-unit.target: 输入字段失去焦点时是否执行验证。如果未设置，它将采用yii \ widgets \ ActiveForm :: $ validateOnBlur的值。

trans-unit.source: Whether to perform validation when the value of an input field is changed.
trans-unit.target: 是否在输入字段的值发生变化时进行验证。

trans-unit.source: Whether to perform validation when the value of an input field is changed. If yii\widgets\ActiveField::$validateOnChange is set, its value will take precedence for that input field.
trans-unit.target: 当输入字段的值更改时是否执行验证。如果设置了yii \ widgets \ ActiveField :: $ validateOnChange，则该值将优先于该输入字段。

trans-unit.source: Whether to perform validation when the value of the input field is changed.
trans-unit.target: 是否在输入字段的值发生变化时进行验证。

trans-unit.source: Whether to perform validation when the value of the input field is changed. If not set, it will take the value of yii\widgets\ActiveForm::$validateOnChange.
trans-unit.target: 输入字段的值更改时是否执行验证。如果未设置，它将采用yii \ widgets \ ActiveForm :: $ validateOnChange的值。

trans-unit.source: Whether to perform validation while the user is typing in an input field.
trans-unit.target: 是否在用户输入字段时进行验证。

trans-unit.source: Whether to perform validation while the user is typing in an input field. If yii\widgets\ActiveField::$validateOnType is set, its value will take precedence for that input field.
trans-unit.target: 用户在输入字段中键入时是否执行验证。如果设置了yii \ widgets \ ActiveField :: $ validateOnType，则其值将优先于该输入字段。

trans-unit.source: Whether to perform validation while the user is typing in the input field.
trans-unit.target: 是否在用户输入字段时进行验证。

trans-unit.source: Whether to perform validation while the user is typing in the input field. If not set, it will take the value of yii\widgets\ActiveForm::$validateOnType.
trans-unit.target: 用户在输入字段中键入时是否执行验证。如果未设置，它将采用yii \ widgets \ ActiveForm :: $ validateOnType的值。

trans-unit.source: Whether to preserve array keys when serializing collection data.
trans-unit.target: 采集数据序列化时是否保留数组键。

trans-unit.source: Whether to preserve array keys when serializing collection data. Set this to true to allow serialization of a collection as a JSON object where array keys are used to index the model objects. The default is to serialize all collections as array, regardless of how the array is indexed.
trans-unit.target: 序列化收集数据时是否保留数组键。将此属性设置为 true 可允许将集合序列化为JSON对象，其中使用数组键索引模型对象。默认值是将所有集合序列化为数组，而不管如何为数组建立索引。

trans-unit.source: Whether to preserve non-empty attribute values.
trans-unit.target: 是否保留非空属性值。

trans-unit.source: Whether to prevent query execution.
trans-unit.target: 是否防止查询执行。

trans-unit.source: Whether to publish the asset files in the asset bundle before it is returned. If you set this false, you must manually call AssetBundle::publish() to publish the asset files.
trans-unit.target: 在返回资产束之前是否发布资产文件。如果设置为false，则必须手动调用 AssetBundle::publish() 来发布资产文件。

trans-unit.source: Whether to recalculate the current page based on the page size and item count.
trans-unit.target: 是否根据页面大小和项目数重新计算当前页面。

trans-unit.source: Whether to recalculate the sort directions
trans-unit.target: 是否重新计算排序方向

trans-unit.source: Whether to recreate cursor, if it is already exist.
trans-unit.target: 如果光标已经存在,是否要重新创建。

trans-unit.source: Whether to recreate iterator, if it is already exist.
trans-unit.target: 如果迭代器已经存在,是否要重新创建。

trans-unit.source: Whether to recursively converts properties which are objects into arrays.
trans-unit.target: 是否递归地将对象的属性转换为数组。

trans-unit.source: Whether to recursively return array representation of embedded objects.
trans-unit.target: 是否递归返回嵌入式对象的数组表示。

trans-unit.source: Whether to reestablish the database connection even, if it is found in the cache.
trans-unit.target: 如果在缓存中发现数据库连接,是否也要重新建立数据库连接。

trans-unit.source: Whether to regenerate CSRF token. When this parameter is true, each time this method is called, a new CSRF token will be generated and persisted (in session or cookie).
trans-unit.target: 是否要重新生成CSRF token。当此参数为真时,每次调用此方法时,都会产生一个新的CSRF token,并持续存在(在session或cookie中)。

trans-unit.source: Whether to register link tags in the HTML header for prev, next, first and last page.
trans-unit.target: 是否在HTML头中注册上一页、下一页、首页和尾页的链接标签。

trans-unit.source: Whether to register link tags in the HTML header for prev, next, first and last page. Defaults to false to avoid conflicts when multiple pagers are used on one page.
trans-unit.target: 是否在HTML标头中为上一页，下一页，第一页和最后一页注册链接标签。默认值是 false ,以避免在一页上使用多个寻呼机时发生冲突。

trans-unit.source: Whether to register wrapper, even if protocol is already taken.
trans-unit.target: 是否要注册包装器,即使协议已经被采用。

trans-unit.source: Whether to release lock on commit.
trans-unit.target: 是否在提交时解除锁定。

trans-unit.source: Whether to rotate log files by copy and truncate in contrast to rotation by renaming files. Defaults to true to be more compatible with log tailers and is windows systems which do not play well with rename on open files. Rotation by renaming however is a bit faster.
trans-unit.target: 与通过重命名文件进行轮换相比，是否通过复制和截断来轮换日志文件。默认为 true ，以便与日志尾部更加兼容，并且是Windows系统，在打开文件上重命名时效果不佳。但是，通过重命名旋转会更快一些。

trans-unit.source: Whether to sort messages by keys when merging new messages with the existing ones. Defaults to false, which means the new (untranslated) messages will be separated from the old (translated) ones.
trans-unit.target: 合并新邮件和现有邮件时,是否按键排序,默认为false,即新邮件(未翻译的)和旧邮件(已翻译的)分开。默认为false,这意味着新的(未翻译的)邮件将与旧的(翻译的)邮件分开。

trans-unit.source: Whether to specially handle AJAX (and PJAX) requests. Defaults to true, meaning if the current request is an AJAX or PJAX request, then calling this method will cause the browser to redirect to the given URL. If this is false, a Location header will be sent, which when received as an AJAX/PJAX response, may NOT cause browser redirection. Takes effect only when request header X-Ie-Redirect-Compatibility is absent.
trans-unit.target: 是否专门处理AJAX（和PJAX）请求。默认为true，表示如果当前请求是AJAX或PJAX请求，则调用此方法将导致浏览器重定向到给定的URL。如果为false，将发送一个 Location 标头，当它作为AJAX / PJAX响应接收时，可能不会导致浏览器重定向。仅在不存在请求标头 X-Ie-Redirect-Compatibility 时有效。

trans-unit.source: Whether to stop validation once first error among attribute value elements is detected.
trans-unit.target: 是否在检测到属性值元素中的第一个错误时停止验证。

trans-unit.source: Whether to stop validation once first error among attribute value elements is detected. When enabled validation will produce single error message on attribute, when disabled - multiple error messages mya appear: one per each invalid value. Note that this option will affect only validateAttribute() value, while validateValue() will not be affected.
trans-unit.target: 一旦检测到属性值元素中的第一个错误，是否停止验证。启用验证后，将在属性上产生一条错误消息，而禁用时，将显示多条错误消息mya：每个无效值一个。请注意，此选项将仅影响validateAttribute（）值，而validateValue（）不会受到影响。

trans-unit.source: Whether to throw a yii\web\BadRequestHttpException if the body is invalid json
trans-unit.target: 如果正文无效，是否抛出yii \ web \ BadRequestHttpException

trans-unit.target: 如果 $id 之前未在定位器中注册，是否引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Whether to trim each element. Can be:
trans-unit.target: 是否对每个元素进行修剪。可以是。

trans-unit.source: Whether to turn on or off the integrity check.
trans-unit.target: 是否开启或关闭诚信检查。

trans-unit.source: Whether to turn on prepare emulation.

trans-unit.source: Whether to turn on prepare emulation. Defaults to false, meaning PDO will use the native prepare support if available. For some databases (such as MySQL), this may need to be set true so that PDO can emulate the prepare support to bypass the buggy native prepare support. The default value is null, which means the PDO ATTR_EMULATE_PREPARES value will not be changed.
trans-unit.target: 是否开启准备模拟。默认值为false,意味着PDO将使用本地的prepare支持(如果有的话)。对于一些数据库(比如MySQL),这可能需要设置为true,这样PDO就可以模拟prepare支持,以绕过错误的本地prepare支持。默认值是null,这意味着PDO ATTR_EMULATE_PREPARES的值不会被改变。

trans-unit.source: Whether to use JSONP response format.
trans-unit.target: 是否使用JSONP响应格式。

trans-unit.source: Whether to use JSONP response format. When this is true, the response data must be an array consisting of data and callback members. The latter should be a JavaScript function name while the former will be passed to this function as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: 是否使用JSONP响应格式。如果为真，则响应数据必须是一个由 data 和 callback 成员组成的数组。后者应为JavaScript函数名称，而前者将作为参数传递给此函数。

trans-unit.source: Whether to use a persistent connection.
trans-unit.target: 是否使用持久连接。

trans-unit.source: Whether to use a persistent connection. This is used by memcache only.
trans-unit.target: 是否使用持久连接。这只被memcache使用。

trans-unit.source: Whether to use and validate auth 'nonce' parameter in authentication flow.
trans-unit.target: 是否在认证流程中使用和验证 auth 'nonce' 参数。

trans-unit.source: Whether to use and validate auth 'state' parameter in authentication flow.
trans-unit.target: 是否在认证流程中使用和验证 auth 'state' 参数。

trans-unit.source: Whether to use and validate auth 'state' parameter in authentication flow. If enabled - the opaque value will be generated and applied to auth URL to maintain state between the request and callback. The authorization server includes this value, when redirecting the user-agent back to the client. The option is used for preventing cross-site request forgery.
trans-unit.target: 是否在认证流程中使用和验证auth'state'参数。如果启用-不透明的值将被生成并应用于 auth URL,以保持请求和回调之间的状态。当把用户代理重定向回客户端时,授权服务器会包含这个值。该选项用于防止跨站请求伪造。

trans-unit.source: Whether to use apcu or apc as the underlying caching extension.
trans-unit.target: 是否使用apcu或apc作为底层缓存扩展。

trans-unit.source: Whether to use apcu or apc as the underlying caching extension. If true, apcu will be used. If false, apc will be used. Defaults to false.
trans-unit.target: 是否使用apcu或apc作为基础缓存扩展。如果为true，将使用apcu。如果为false，将使用apc。默认为false。

trans-unit.source: Whether to use big-endian when reading and writing an integer.
trans-unit.target: 读写整数时,是否使用大英字型。

trans-unit.source: Whether to use cookie to persist CSRF token.
trans-unit.target: 是否使用cookie来坚持CSRF标记。

trans-unit.source: Whether to use cookie to persist CSRF token. If false, CSRF token will be stored in session under the name of $csrfParam. Note that while storing CSRF tokens in session increases security, it requires starting a session for every page, which will degrade your site performance.
trans-unit.target: 是否使用cookie来保留CSRF令牌。如果为false，则CSRF令牌将以$ csrfParam的名称存储在会话中。请注意，虽然将CSRF令牌存储在会话中可提高安全性，但它需要为每个页面启动会话，这将降低站点性能。

trans-unit.source: Whether to use custom storage.
trans-unit.target: 是否使用自定义存储。

trans-unit.source: Whether to use error message composed by validator declared via $rule if its validation fails.
trans-unit.target: 如果验证失败，是否使用通过$ rule声明的验证器组成的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: Whether to use error message composed by validator declared via $rule if its validation fails. If enabled, error message specified for this validator itself will appear only if attribute value is not an array. If disabled, own error message value will be used always.
trans-unit.target: 如果验证失败，是否使用通过$ rule声明的验证器组成的错误消息。如果启用，则仅当属性值不是数组时，才会显示为此验证器本身指定的错误消息。如果禁用，则将始终使用自己的错误消息值。

trans-unit.source: Whether to use memcached or memcache as the underlying caching extension.
trans-unit.target: 是否使用memcached或memcache作为底层缓存扩展。

trans-unit.source: Whether to use memcached or memcache as the underlying caching extension. If true, memcached will be used. If false, memcache will be used. Defaults to false.
trans-unit.target: 是否使用memcached或memcache作为基础缓存扩展。如果为true，则将使用memcached。如果为false，将使用内存缓存。默认为false。

trans-unit.source: Whether to use session to persist authentication status across multiple requests.
trans-unit.target: 是否使用会话在多个请求中坚持认证状态。

trans-unit.source: Whether to use session to persist authentication status across multiple requests. You set this property to be false if your application is stateless, which is often the case for RESTful APIs.
trans-unit.target: 是否使用会话在多个请求之间保留身份验证状态。如果您的应用程序是无状态的，则将此属性设置为 false ，对于RESTful API来说通常是这种情况。

trans-unit.source: Whether to use symbolic link to publish asset files.
trans-unit.target: 是否使用符号链接来发布资产文件。

trans-unit.source: Whether to use symbolic link to publish asset files. Defaults to false, meaning asset files are copied to $basePath. Using symbolic links has the benefit that the published assets will always be consistent with the source assets and there is no copy operation required. This is especially useful during development.
trans-unit.target: 是否使用符号链接发布资产文件。默认为false，表示资产文件复制到$ basePath。使用符号链接的好处是发布的资产将始终与源资产保持一致，并且不需要复制操作。这在开发期间特别有用。

trans-unit.source: Whether to use the file extension to determine the MIME type in case finfo_open() cannot determine it.
trans-unit.target: 在 finfo_open() 无法确定MIME类型的情况下，是否使用文件扩展名来确定MIME类型。

trans-unit.source: Whether to use transparent background.
trans-unit.target: 是否使用透明背景。

trans-unit.source: Whether to use transparent background. Defaults to false.
trans-unit.target: 是否使用透明背景。默认为false。

trans-unit.source: Whether to validate given attribute orders against $attributes and $enableMultiSort. If validation is enabled incorrect entries will be removed.
trans-unit.target: 是否根据$ attributes和$ enableMultiSort验证给定的属性顺序。如果启用了验证，则将删除不正确的条目。

trans-unit.source: Whether to validate page size.
trans-unit.target: 是否验证页面大小。

trans-unit.source: Widgets are primarily used in views. You can call the yii\base\Widget::widget() method to use a widget in a view. For example, the following code inserts a date picker widget which is configured to use the Russian language and keep the input in the from_date attribute of $model.

trans-unit.source: Widgets are reusable building blocks used in views to create complex and configurable user interface elements in an object-oriented fashion. trans-unit.source: Widgets should be designed to be self-contained. That is, when using a widget, you should be able to just drop it in a view without doing anything else. trans-unit.source: X-Sendfile is a feature allowing a web application to redirect the request for a file to the webserver that in turn processes the request, this way eliminating the need to perform tasks like reading the file and sending it to the user. When dealing with a lot of files (or very big files) this can lead to a great increase in performance as the web application is allowed to terminate earlier while the webserver is handling the request.
trans-unit.target: X-Sendfile是一个允许web应用程序将文件请求重定向到web服务器的功能,web服务器再处理该请求,这样就不需要执行读取文件并将其发送给用户的任务。当处理大量文件(或非常大的文件)时,这可以极大地提高性能,因为web应用程序可以在web服务器处理请求时提前终止。

trans-unit.source: XSS or cross-site scripting happens when output isn't escaped properly when outputting HTML to the browser. For example, if user can enter his name and instead of Alexander he enters <script>alert('Hello!');</script>, every page that outputs user name without escaping it will execute JavaScript alert('Hello!'); resulting in alert box popping up in a browser. Depending on website instead of innocent alert such script could send messages using your name or even perform bank transactions.
trans-unit.target: 当将HTML输出到浏览器时，如果没有正确地转义输出，则会发生XSS或跨站点脚本。例如，如果用户可以输入自己的姓名，而不是输入 Alexander ，而是输入 <script>alert('Hello!');</script> ，则每个输出用户名但不转义的页面都将执行JavaScript alert('Hello!'); 导致警报框在浏览器中弹出。取决于网站而不是无辜的警报，此类脚本可以使用您的姓名发送消息，甚至执行银行交易。

trans-unit.source: Yii creates a DI container when you include the Yii.php file in the entry script of your application. The DI container is accessible via Yii::$container. When you call Yii::createObject(), the method will actually call the container's get() method to create a new object. As aforementioned, the DI container will automatically resolve the dependencies (if any) and inject them into obtained object. Because Yii uses Yii::createObject() in most of its core code to create new objects, this means you can customize the objects globally by dealing with Yii::$container.
trans-unit.target: 当您在应用程序的输入脚本中包含 Yii.php 文件时，Yii将创建一个DI容器。 DI容器可通过Yii :: $ container访问。当您调用Yii :: createObject（）时，该方法实际上将调用容器的get（）方法来创建一个新对象。如前所述，DI容器将自动解析依赖项（如果有）并将它们注入获得的对象中。因为Yii 在其大多数核心代码中使用Yii :: createObject（）来创建新对象，所以这意味着您可以通过处理Yii :: $ container来全局自定义对象。

trans-unit.source: Yii defines a set of core application components with fixed IDs and default configurations. For example, the request component is used to collect information about a user request and resolve it into a route; the db component represents a database connection through which you can perform database queries. It is with help of these core application components that Yii applications are able to handle user requests.
trans-unit.target: Yii定义了一组具有固定ID和默认配置的核心应用程序组件。例如，请求组件用于收集有关用户请求的信息，并将其解析为路由；该数据库组件表示，通过它可以进行数据库查询数据库连接。借助于这些核心应用程序组件，Yii应用程序能够处理用户请求。

trans-unit.source: Yii has many pre-defined aliases already available. For example, the alias @yii represents the installation path of the Yii framework; @web represents the base URL for the currently running Web application.
trans-unit.target: Yii有许多可用的预定义别名。例如，别名 @yii 代表Yii框架的安装路径。 @web 表示当前正在运行的Web应用程序的基本URL。

trans-unit.source: Yii implements its service locator on top of the dependency injection (DI) container. When a service locator is trying to create a new object instance, it will forward the call to the DI container. The latter will resolve the dependencies automatically as described above.

trans-unit.source: Yii manages asset bundles through an application component named assetManager which is implemented by yii\web\AssetManager. For example, the default yii\web\JqueryAsset asset bundle uses the jquery.js file from the installed jquery Bower package. To improve the availability and performance, you may want to use a version hosted by Google. This can be achieved by configuring assetManager in the application configuration like the following:

trans-unit.source: Yii provides convenient helper functions that allow you to encrypt/decrypt data using a secret key. The data is passed through the encryption function so that only the person which has the secret key will be able to decrypt it. For example, we need to store some information in our database but we need to make sure only the user who has the secret key can view it (even if the application database is compromised):
trans-unit.target: Yii提供了方便的辅助功能,允许你使用密匙加密/解密数据。数据通过加密功能,只有拥有密匙的人才能解密。例如,我们需要在数据库中存储一些信息,但我们需要确保只有拥有密匙的用户才能查看这些信息(即使应用程序的数据库被破坏)。

trans-unit.source: Yii provides the following core extensions that are developed and maintained by the Yii developer team. They are all registered on Packagist and can be easily installed as described in the Using Extensions subsection.
trans-unit.target: Yii提供了以下由Yii开发人员团队开发和维护的核心扩展。它们均已在Packagist上注册，并且可以按照“ 使用扩展”小节中的说明轻松安装。

trans-unit.source: Yii provides two base controller classes to simplify your work of creating RESTful actions: yii\rest\Controller and yii\rest\ActiveController. The difference between these two controllers is that the latter provides a default set of actions that are specifically designed to deal with resources represented as Active Record. So if you are using Active Record and are comfortable with the provided built-in actions, you may consider extending your controller classes from yii\rest\ActiveController, which will allow you to create powerful RESTful APIs with minimal code.
trans-unit.target: Yii提供了两个基本的控制器类来简化创建RESTful动作的工作：yii \ rest \ Controller和yii \ rest \ ActiveController。这两个控制器之间的区别在于，后者提供了一组默认的操作，这些操作专门用于处理表示为Active Record的资源。因此，如果您正在使用Active Record并且对提供的内置操作感到满意，则可以考虑从yii \ rest \ ActiveController扩展控制器类，这将使您可以使用最少的代码来创建功能强大的RESTful API。

trans-unit.source: Yii relies on the class autoloading mechanism to locate and include all required class files. It provides a high-performance class autoloader that is compliant with the PSR-4 standard. The autoloader is installed when you include the Yii.php file.
trans-unit.target: Yii依靠类自动加载机制来查找和包含所有必需的类文件。它提供了符合PSR-4标准的高性能自动装带器。当您包含 Yii.php 文件时，即会安装自动装带器。

trans-unit.source: Yii relies on the installed pre-processor tools to convert assets. For example, to use LESS you should install the lessc pre-processor command.
trans-unit.target: Yii依赖于已安装的预处理器工具来转换资产。例如，要使用LESS，应安装 lessc 预处理程序命令。

trans-unit.source: Yii represents each cookie as an object of yii\web\Cookie. Both yii\web\Request and yii\web\Response maintain a collection of cookies via the property named cookies. The cookie collection in the former represents the cookies submitted in a request, while the cookie collection in the latter represents the cookies that are to be sent to the user.
trans-unit.target: Yii将每个cookie表示为yii \ web \ Cookie的对象。这两个警予\网络\请求和警予\网络\响应通过属性命名保持饼干的集合 cookies 。前者中的cookie集合表示在请求中提交的cookie，而后者中的cookie集合表示要发送给用户的cookie。

trans-unit.target: Yii安全助手使生成伪随机数据变得简单。

trans-unit.source: Yii supports a so-called global event, which is actually a trick based on the event mechanism described above. The global event requires a globally accessible Singleton, such as the application instance itself.
trans-unit.target: Yii支持所谓的全局事件，它实际上是基于上述事件机制的一个技巧。全局事件需要可全局访问的Singleton，例如应用程序实例本身。

trans-unit.source: Yii supports composition and sending of the email messages. However, the framework core provides only the content composition functionality and basic interface. Actual mail sending mechanism should be provided by the extension, because different projects may require its different implementation and it usually depends on the external services and libraries.
trans-unit.target: Yii支持邮件信息的组成和发送。然而,框架核心只提供了内容组成功能和基本接口。实际的邮件发送机制应该由扩展提供,因为不同的项目可能需要不同的实现,而且通常依赖于外部服务和库。

trans-unit.source: Yii supports content negotiation via the yii\filters\ContentNegotiator filter. The RESTful API base controller class yii\rest\Controller is equipped with this filter under the name of contentNegotiator. trans-unit.source: Yii uses the PHP intl extension to provide most of its I18N features, such as the date and number formatting of the yii\i18n\Formatter class and the message formatting using yii\i18n\MessageFormatter. Both classes provide a fallback mechanism when the intl extension is not installed. However, the fallback implementation only works well for English target language. So it is highly recommended that you install intl when I18N is needed.
trans-unit.target: Yii使用PHP intl扩展来提供其大多数I18N功能，例如yii \ i18n \ Formatter类的日期和数字格式以及使用yii \ i18n \ MessageFormatter进行的消息格式。当未安装 intl 扩展名时，这两个类都提供了一个后备机制。但是，后备实现仅适用于英语目标语言。因此，强烈建议您在需要I18N时安装 intl 。

trans-unit.source: You are able to fetch additional columns or values from query and store it inside the Active Record. For example, assume we have a table named room, which contains information about rooms available in the hotel. Each room stores information about its geometrical size using fields length, width, height. Imagine we need to retrieve list of all available rooms with their volume in descendant order. So you can not calculate volume using PHP, because we need to sort the records by its value, but you also want volume to be displayed in the list. To achieve the goal, you need to declare an extra field in your Room Active Record class, which will store volume value:
trans-unit.target: 您可以从查询中获取其他列或值，并将其存储在Active Record中。例如，假设我们有一个名为 room 的表，其中包含有关酒店可用房间的信息。每个房间都使用 length ， width ， height 字段存储有关其几何尺寸的信息。想象一下，我们需要检索所有可用房间的列表，并按降序排列它们的体积。因此，您无法使用PHP计算体积，因为我们需要按记录的值对记录进行排序，但是您还希望在列表中显示 volume 。为了实现该目标，您需要在“ Room 活动记录”类中声明一个额外的字段，该字段将存储 volume 值：
